long_description: Covers trails in central portion of Utah's Wasatch Range from City Creek Canyon to American Fork Canyon. Veranth, John. Softcover; 208 pages; photos and maps. University Utah Press; copyright 1998. Includes descriptions for easy hikes on well maintained trails for beginners, and peaks suggested for experts. Maps, photos and line drawings accompany trail descriptions.
short_description: Covers trails in central portion of Utah's Wasatch Range from City Creek Canyon to American Fork Canyon.
